translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Chapter on the Conditions in Triads

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.46. Āsavaduka, Sanidassanattika🔽Naāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Nanoāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…🔽vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  āsava duka sani dassana ttika  na āsavam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na no āsavam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe  vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: no āsavam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca purima nayena tīṇi pañhāḥ hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: no āsavam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With respect to root cause one, with respect to predominance one, … with respect to non-delusion one.
